definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)

sentences.english: Honing machine tools of a new generation have also gone into production.
sentences.chinese: 新型珩磨机床已经投入运营。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要论述了数控机床热误差实验。

sentences.english: First, the computer gong overhaul, restoration of precision machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 电脑锣大修，恢复机床精度。

sentences.english: Feed and dressing movements are controled by means of two independent driving systems.
sentences.chinese: 机床的进给及修正，由二个互不干涉的传动机构执行。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 机床主传动系统有常规变速和非常规变速两种。

sentences.english: The obvious regional also reflects the imbalance in the development of CNC machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 地域性的明显也反应了我国数控机床发展的不均衡。

sentences.english: Also, the precision of machine tools for die machining and microfabrication has improved.
sentences.chinese: 此外，为机床模具加工和微细加工精度有所改善。

sentences.english: The utility model belongs to the machine tool equipment class.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型属于机床设备类。

sentences.english: A shortcut route has been provided for working out the post-process program of parallel-link machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 为编制虚拟轴机床数控后处理程序提供一条捷径。

sentences.english: They have provided China's “factory to the world” with its machine-tools.
sentences.chinese: 他们给“世界工厂”中国提供机床。

sentences.english: When I go into the workshop, I will teach you how to operate an NC machine.
sentences.chinese: 当我走进车间时，我将要教会你们如何操作数控机床。

sentences.english: America's machine-tool industry was on the ropes.
sentences.chinese: 美国的机床工业是岌岌可危了。

sentences.english: The finished model was manufactured by 3-axis NC milling machine.
sentences.chinese: 最终利用3轴精雕机床进行数控铣削编程加工。

sentences.english: Be responsible for implement the machine's maintenance and daily checking.
sentences.chinese: 负责机床的日常保养和点检的落实。

sentences.english: The technology of circumferentially grinding the guideways of machine tools is an economical and practical way.
sentences.chinese: 周边磨削机床导轨工艺是一条经济实用的途径。

sentences.english: We designed a roller Rikon for a special machine.
sentences.chinese: 我们设计了托辊里孔加工专用机床。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
